seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Health-conscious consumers expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 35 Shopify supplements stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 51, Top 10%: 74. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for supplements stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Supplements store scores 50 on PageSpeed, in the "needs improvement" range
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 74+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 45 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
Some stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Supplements Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 35 Shopify stores in the health supplements industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Supplement stores often have large catalogs. Fast page loads let shoppers efficiently compare products and read the detailed information they need.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 35 Shopify supplements stores, the median pagespeed score is 51. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 74. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my supplements store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other supplements stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 51 (the median), you're in the top half of supplements stores. If you're better than 74, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
